scripts.release:experimental: cp ./README.md ./libs/ngx-appwrite/README.md && cp ./changelog.md ./libs/ngx-appwrite/changelog.md && cd ./libs/ngx-appwrite && cd .. && cd .. && nx build ngx-appwrite --prod && cd ./dist/libs/ngx-appwrite && npm publish --registry https://verdaccio.nas4.us
scripts.release:experimental:patch: cp ./README.md ./libs/ngx-appwrite/README.md && cp ./changelog.md ./libs/ngx-appwrite/changelog.md && cd ./libs/ngx-appwrite && npm version patch && cd .. && cd .. && nx build ngx-appwrite --prod && cd ./dist/libs/ngx-appwrite && npm publish --registry https://verdaccio.nas4.us
scripts.release:npm:no-patch: cp ./README.md ./libs/ngx-appwrite/README.md && cp ./changelog.md ./libs/ngx-appwrite/changelog.md && cd ./libs/ngx-appwrite && cd .. && cd .. && nx build ngx-appwrite --prod && cd ./dist/libs/ngx-appwrite && npm publish
scripts.release:npm:patch: cp ./README.md ./libs/ngx-appwrite/README.md && cp ./changelog.md ./libs/ngx-appwrite/changelog.md && cd ./libs/ngx-appwrite && npm version patch && cd .. && cd .. && nx build ngx-appwrite --prod && cd ./dist/libs/ngx-appwrite && npm publish
scripts.full:reset: nx reset && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm bun.lock && bun install
